choices: The murder of  your best friend
The big massacre of the halloween party
You don't remember what exactly happened
1.content: You are Tom, a lonely 15 years old teenager, exactly 9 year has been passed from your traumatic past in that house, since you think you are brave enough to try to solve the mistery about...
1.title: A deadly decision

11.content:
The murder of your family...
You still remember all...
You can only think about all that blood in the house...
The dead body of your mom and your dad...
You can barely remember the crushed face of your brother...
All that blood...
You only want one thing...
11.title: I want my family back...

choices: Make your own way inside the house
111.content:
Try to solve the mystery...
Since you realized it...No matter if you kill the murderer or not, your family is not going to come back...
After drop a few tears...You are ready, now you try to enter the house, but the door was closed,so you realize you need...
111.title: Try to solve the mistery

1111.content: Since you realized it, no matter how hard you try to open the door, it will no open, so you started searching a key in...
1111.title: Find a key

choices: Get back to the main door
11111.content:
You decided to start searching in the greenhouse...
You still remember, your mother teaching you how to take care of the plants, all the fun you have in that place...
Since that place makes you sad so you started searching to get out as soon as possible...at the end you found nothing, so you get out and continue your quest...
11111.title: Seeds of sadness

choices: Run away and dont come back...
111111.content:
When you get back to the main door, it was open so you decided to go to take a look when you approached the house you heared a ghostly scream inside the house...
You decided to...
111111.title: Get back to the main door

1111111.content:
You tried to run...but...you remember, the reason becaus you was here...
so you decided to brave yourself and go insinde the house in your posibly last day of your life...
When you ener the house, the door get slammed and no matter how hard you tried to open it since something is blocking it, so you decided to get your first steps in the house,until you heared a voice oddly familiar...
"Tom...i am so glad you come back...now we can play together forever..."
After the voice stopped you realized it..."There is someone...or something in this house" after a while you decided to go to...
1111111.title: Go inside the house

1111112.content:
You runned in fear...you decided to never take a look to that house again...
At least you survived to your quest...but...there´s still something wrong with your life...

"Tom...Tom...come...play with me one more time..."
1111112.title: Run away and dont come back...

112.content:
You just want to see the murderer dead, you want to crush his face and make him suffer as you, you want to torture him until he can´t breath because of the pain...
Now you are ready to enter the house...but....
112.title: REVENGE!

choices: Make your own way inside the house
1121.content: The door is closed...since no matter how you force it the door just no opens...since you realize you must
1121.title: Your first obstacle

11211.content:
Find a key...
You remember there´s a hidden key in some place in the garden of the house, but, due the psichologic traumas you can´t remember very well...
So you start searching in...
11211.title: Find a key

112111.content:
You started searching in the greenhouse...
Since 9 years has been passed so the platns are rotten...
In the moment you enter the greenhouse, you feel something really weird...just like someone was watching you...
Ignoring this, you searched the key, founding nothing but a weird note, you decided to read it:

Dear Family;
I can´t live like this for the rest of my life... so i decided it...there´s only a way i can make you live with me forever...

Just after you finished reading the note you hear a big slam, in the moment you turned your head, a giant hammer crushed yoour head causing you several brain demage...
On your last moments of your life you can only hear a voice...
"I DID IT! NOW WE CAN LIVE HAPPY FOREVER"
112111.title: The greenhouse

info.brief_description: Will you unlock the good ending or you are going to reach to a dead end?
info.description:
Well first i want to say sorry for my bad english :S
This story is going to tell you the story of a haunted house, the main characters are Tom and a mysterious ghost, please follow the rules:
1-If the main character dies the whole story is over.
2-The ghost can be any person you want (a murderer, a Tom's familiar, an evil spirit, etc.)
3-Tom wants to reveal the mystery about the house, the mystery can or can't have a realation with him.
4-Remember, depending on the Tom actions the story can have a good ending or a bad ending.
5-There can be more people in the house and they can be friendly...or not.
6-There is only ONE ghost in the house.
7-The story must have at least one good ending.
8-Have fun.
